name: ApplePicker (MichaelMXY)
description:
___What are the controls to your game? How do we play?___

Move your mouse Left and Right

  ___What creative additions did you make? How can we find them?___

1. Background Music and Apple SoundEffect

2. Gold Apple which worth 200 points. ( Follow the video's steps)

3. Random Apple spawn time (which mean apple drop delay time will be random) 

4. Walls created in the scene.

5. New background added.

Other things followed the tutorial on "Game Design, Prototyping, and Development 3rd Edition.

  ___Any assets used that you didn't create yourself? (art, music, etc. Just tell us where you got it, link it here)___

I used Garageband to create my music and soundeffect. 

  ___Did you receive help from anyone outside this class? (list their names and what they helped with)___

No

  ___Did you get help from any online websites, videos, or tutorials? (link them here)___

No
